attributes.action: Pay attention to online submissions,and treat them with due regard.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a previous petition we requested that the government (not the Prime Minister as stated above) refuse to allow the Church of Scientology never be accepted as a religion, and that it in-fact enslaves its current believers. http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15777.asp - zero acknowledgments were made to what we requested/claimed, this seeming democracy has completely ignored our petition and expects nothing to come of it. This must be dealt with.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
